channel.title: Cannon Ball Smelter Needed
channel.description:
Cannon Ball Smelter Needed -
Could anyone please be kind enough to make a cannon ball smelter for SCAR if there is already one made could you please point me towards it as i have had no luck searching the boards for it.
Im aware that supersmelt for aryan does it but i do not wish to use aryan on my main :)
Thanks to all that reply sensibly.

item.title: Cannon Ball Smelter Needed
item.dc:creator: @Doug Doug
item.description:
@Doug wrote:

Your kidding right ? Aryan is like 80% detectable thats why everyone uses scar on their mains, and scar on their nubs (plus the multiple account thing for using on nubs)

Read full topic

item.title: Cannon Ball Smelter Needed
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Aryan is less detectable, use it instead. ( In my opinion )

Read full topic
